@manuel sorry it was the one attached, that image you used is the one from her email signature. It's called image00010.jpeg 1 mb
@heath actually the images so small.
@manuel please see the client request below about the header image.

@manuel all good, they technically probably should be on the page, they should be at the theme level, but it's just something to take note of for other sites etc. 

It's one of those ones that's an easy fix as long as you know where to look haha. Cheers
